GE07bhg4c17u:2: teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c17u:6: pūrvādhyāyānte yaḥ śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya vartate kāma-cārataḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:7: na sa siddhim avāpnoti [Gītā 16.24] ity anena śāstrokta-vidhim utsṛjya kāma-cāreṇa vartamānasya jñāne 'dhikāro nāstīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c17u:8: tatra śāstram utsṛjya kāma-cāraṃ vinā śraddayā vartamānānāṃ kim adhikāro 'sti nāsti veti bubhutsayā 'rjuna uvāca ya iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:9: atra ca śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajanta ity anena śāstrārthaṃ buddhyā tam ullaṅghya vartamāno na gṛhyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:14: yajante sāttvikā devān ity ādy uttarānupapatteś ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:16: api tu kleśa-buddhy-ālasyād vā śāstrārtha-jñāne prayatnam akṛtvā kevalam ācāra-paramparā-vaśena śraddhayā
GE07bhg4c17u:18: ato 'yam arthaḥ ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya duḥkha-buddhyālasya-dvārā anādṛtya kevalam ācāra-prāmāṇyena śraddhayā 'nvitāḥ santo yajante teṣāṃ kā niṣṭhā /
GE07bhg4c17u:21: tām eva viśeṣeṇa pṛcchati kiṃ sattvam /
GE07bhg4c17u:27: śraddhāyāḥ sattva-saṃśritā tarhi teṣām api sāttvikatvād yathoktātma-jñāne 'dhikāraḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:31: kecic chāstra-vidhiṃ jñātvāpy aśraddhayā tam utsṛjya kāma-kāra-mātreṇa yat kiṃcid anutiṣṭhanti te sarva-puruṣārthāyogyatvād asurāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:32: kecit tu śāstra-vidhiṃ jñātvā śraddadhānatayā tad-anusāreṇaiva niṣiddhaṃ varjayanto vihitam anutiṣṭhanti te sarva-puruṣārtha-yogyatvād devā iti pūrvādhyāyānte siddham /
GE07bhg4c17u:33: ye tu śāstrīyaṃ vidhim ālasyādi-vaśād upekṣya śraddadhānatayaiva vṛddha-vyavahāra-mātreṇa niṣiddhaṃ varjayanto vihitam anutiṣṭhanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:35: ca deva-sādharmyeṇānvitāḥ kim asureṣv antarbhavanti kiṃ vā deveṣv ity ubhaya-dharma-darśanād
GE07bhg4c17u:36: eka-koṭi-niścāyakādarśanāc ca sandihāno 'rjuna uvāca ya iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:37: ye pūrvādhyāye ta nirṇītā na devavac chāstrānusāriṇaḥ kintu śāstra-vidhiṃ śruti-smṛti-codanām
GE07bhg4c17u:38: utsṛjyālasyādi-vaśād anādṛtya nāsuravad aśraddadhānāḥ kiṃ tu vṛddha-vyavahārānusāreṇa
GE07bhg4c17u:39: śraddhayānvitā yajante deva-pūjādikaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ tu śāstra-vidhy-upekṣā-śraddhābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:40: pūrva-niścita-devāsura-vilakṣaṇānāṃ niṣṭhā kā kīdṛśī teṣāṃ śāstra-vidhy-anapekṣā
GE07bhg4c17u:46: kiṃ rajas tamo rājasī tāmsī ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:47: tathā sati rājasa-tāmasatvād asurās te sattvam ity ekā koṭiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:48: rajas tama ity aparā koṭir iti vibhāga-jñāpanāyāho-śabdaḥ //17.1//
GE07bhg4c17u:50: atha saptadaśe vastu sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ tathā /
GE07bhg4c17u:54: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim //[Gītā 16.24]
GE07bhg4c17u:56: tatrāham idaṃ jijñāsa ity āha ya iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:57: ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya kāma-cārato vartante kintu kāma-bhoga-rahitā eva śraddhayānvitāḥ santo yajante taop-yajña-jñāna-yajña-japa-yajñādikaṃ kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:58: teṣāṃ kā niṣṭhā sthitiḥ kim ālambanam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:63: sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ vastu tāmasaṃ ca vivekataḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:65: vedam adhītya tad-vidhinā tad-arthānutiṣṭhantaḥ śāstrīya-śraddhā-yuktā devāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:66: vedam avajñāya yathecchā-cāriṇo veda-bāhyās tv āsurā iti pūrvasminn adhyāye tvayoktam /
GE07bhg4c17u:68: ye janāḥ pāṭhato 'rthataś ca durgamaṃ vedaṃ viditvālasyādinā tad-vidhim utsṛjya lokācāra-jātayā śraddhayānvitāḥ santo devādīn yajante,
GE07bhg4c17u:70: sattvaṃ saṃśrayā teṣāṃ sthitir athavā rajas tamaḥ saṃśrayeti koṭi-dvayāvabodhāyāho-śabdo madhye niveśitaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c17u:72: trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāvajā /
GE07bhg4c17u:73: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu //2//
GE07bhg4c17u:75: ayam arthaḥ śāstra-tattva-jñānataḥ pravartamānānāṃ parameśvara-pūjā-viṣayā sāttvikī ekavidhaiva bhavati śraddhā /
GE07bhg4c17u:76: lokācāra-mātreṇa tu pravartamānānāṃ dehināṃ yā śraddhā sā tu sāttvikī rājasī tāmasī ceti trividhā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:80: svabhāvam anyathā kartuṃ samarthaṃ śāstrotthaṃ viveka-jñānam /
GE07bhg4c17u:82: ataḥ kevalaṃ pūrva-svabhāvena bhavantī śraddhā trividhā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:83: tām imāṃ trividhāṃ śraddhāṃ śṛṇv iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:84: tad uktaṃ vyavasāyātmikā buddhir ekeha kurunandana ity ādinā //2//
GE07bhg4c17u:86: ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya śraddhayā yajante te śraddhā-bhedād bhidyante /
GE07bhg4c17u:87: tatra ye sāttvikyā śraddhayānvitās te devāḥ śāstrokta-sādhane 'dhikriyante tat-phalena cayujyante /
GE07bhg4c17u:88: ye tu rājasyā tāmasyā ca śraddhayānvitās te 'surā na śāstrīya-sādhane 'dhikriyante
GE07bhg4c17u:89: na vā tat-phalena yujyanta iti vivekenārjunasya sandeham apaninīṣuḥ śraddhā-bhedaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:91: yathā śraddhayānvitāḥ śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajante sā dehināṃ svabhāvajā,
GE07bhg4c17u:93: sa tri-vidhaḥ sāttviko rājasas tāmasaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c17u:94: tena janitā śraddhā tri-vidhā bhavati sāttvikī rājasī tāmasī ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:96: yā tv ārabdhe janmani śāstra-saṃskāra-mātrajā viduṣāṃ sā kāraṇaika-rūpatvād
GE07bhg4c17u:102: yataḥ prāg-bhavīya-vāsanākhya-svabhāvasyābhibhāvakaṃ śāstrīyaṃ viveka-vijñānam anādṛta-śāstrāṇāṃ dehināṃ nāsti atas teṣāṃ svabhāva-vaśāt tridhā bhavantīṃ tāṃ śraddhāṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c17u:103: śrutvā ca devāsura-bhāvaṃ svayam evāvadhārayety arthaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c17u:105: bho arjuna prathamaṃ śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajatāṃ niṣṭhāṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c17u:106: paścāt śāstra-vidhi-tyāgināṃ niṣṭhāṃ te vakṣyāmīty āha trividheti /
GE07bhg4c17u:109: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān uvāca trividheti /
GE07bhg4c17u:110: ālasyāt kleśāc ca śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya ye śraddhayā devādīn yajante dehinaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:111: sā teṣāṃ svabhāvajā bodhyā prāktanaḥ śubhāśubha-saṃskāraḥ svabhāvas tasmāj jātety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:112: anādi-triguṇa-prakṛti-saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ dehinām anādito 'nāvṛttasya saṃsārasya sāttvikatvādinā traividhyāt taj-jāta-śraddhāpi trividhety āha sāttvikītyādi
GE07bhg4c17u:113: svabhāvam anyathayituṃ samarthā khalu sad-upadiṣṭa-śāstra-janyā viveka-saṃvit sā teṣāṃ nāsty ataḥ svabhāvajā śraddhā trividhā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:114: tādṛk-śāstra-janyā śraddhā tv anyaiva yathā tad-ukti-vidhinaiva tad-arthānuṣṭhānam //2//
GE07bhg4c17u:117: śraddhā-mayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yac-chraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c17u:118: śrīdharaḥ : nanu ca śraddhā sāttviky eva sattva-kāryatvena tvayaiva śrī-bhāgavate uddhavaṃ prati nirdiṣṭatvāt / yathoktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c17u:119: śamo damas titikṣejyā tapaḥ satyaṃ dayā smṛtiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:120: tuṣṭis tyāgo 'spṛhā śraddhā hrīr dayā nirvṛttir dhṛtiḥ //[BhP 11.25.2]
GE07bhg4c17u:124: tathāpi rajas-tamo-yukta-puruṣāśrayatvena rajas-tamo-miśritatvena sattvasya traividhyāc chraddhāyāpi traividhyaṃ ghaṭate ity āhasattvānurūpeti
GE07bhg4c17u:125: sattvānurūpā sattva-tāratamyānusāriṇī sarvasya vivekino 'vivekino lokasya śraddhā vikriata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:126: tad evāha yo yac chraddhaḥ yādṛśī śraddhā yasya /
GE07bhg4c17u:129: yaḥ pūrvaṃ sattvotkarṣeṇa sāttvika-śraddhayā yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ sa punas tādṛśa-sva-saṃskāreṇa sāttvika-śraddhayāyukta eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:130: yas tu rajasa utkarṣeṇa rājasa-śraddhayā yuktaḥ sa punas tādṛśa eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:131: yas tu tamasa utkarṣeṇa tāmasa-śraddhayā yuktaḥ sa punas tādṛśa eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:134: tu svabhāva-vijayena sāttvikī ekaiva śraddheti prakaraṇārthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c17u:138: tac ca kvacid udrikta-sattvam eva yathā devānām /
GE07bhg4c17u:142: tac ca śāstrīya-viveka-jñānenodbhūta-sattvaṃ rajas-tamasī abhibhūya kriyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:143: śāstrīya-viveka-vijñāna-śūnyasya tu sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya sattvānurūpā śraddhā sattva-vaicitryād vicitrā bhavati,
GE07bhg4c17u:145: rajaḥ-pradhāne tasmin rājasī tamaḥ-pradhāne tu tasmiṃs
GE07bhg4c17u:146: tāmasīti / he bhārata mahā-kula-prasūta jñāna-nirateti vā śuddha-sāttvikatvaṃ dyotayati /
GE07bhg4c17u:147: yat tvayā pṛṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ niṣṭā keti tatrottaraṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c17u:148: ayaṃ śāstrīya-jñāna-śūnyaḥ karmādhikṛtaḥ puruṣas triguṇāntaḥ-karaṇa-sampiṇḍitaḥ śraddhā-mayaḥ prācuryeṇāsmin śraddhā prakṛteti tat-prastuta-vacane mayaṭ /
GE07bhg4c17u:150: ato yo yac-chradho yā sāttvikī rājasī tāmasī vā śraddhā yasya sa eva śraddhānurūpa eva sa sāttviko rājasas tāmaso vā /
GE07bhg4c17u:153: sattvam antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ tāmasaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:157: yac-chraddho yasmin yajanīye deve 'sure rākṣase vā śraddhāvān yo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:158: sa sa eva bhavati tat tac chabdenaiva vyapadiśyata ity arthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c17u:159: baladevaḥ : yadyapi śraddhā sattva-guṇa-vṛttis tathāpy antaḥ-karaṇa-dharmasya svabhāvasyāntaḥ-karaṇasya
GE07bhg4c17u:160: ca dharmiṇas traividhyāt tad-uditāyās tasyās traividhyaṃ siddhyed iti bhāvenāha sattvānurūpeti /
GE07bhg4c17u:161: sattvam antaḥkaraṇaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ tad-anurūpā sarvasya prāṇijātasya śraddhā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:165: ato 'yaṃ pūjya-pūjaka-rūpo laukikaḥ puruṣaḥ śraddhāmayas trividha-śraddhā-pracuro yaḥ puruṣo yac-chraddho yasmin pūjye devādau yakṣādau pretādau ca śraddhāvān bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:166: sa pūjako 'pi sa eva tat-tac-chabdena vyapadeśya pūjya-guṇavān pūjaka ity arthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c17u:168: pretān bhūtagaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c17u:169: śrīdharaḥ : sāttvikādi-bhedam eva kārya-bhedena prapañcayati yajanta iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:170: sāttvikā janāḥ sattva-prakṛtīn devān eva yajante pūjayanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:171: rājasās tu rajaḥ-prakṛtīn yakṣān rakṣasāṃś ca yajante /
GE07bhg4c17u:172: etebhyo 'nye vilakṣaṇās tāmasā janās tāmasān eva pretān bhūta-gaṇāṃś ca yajante /
GE07bhg4c17u:173: sattvādi-prakṛtīnāṃ tat-tad-devādīnāṃ pūjā-rucibhis tat-tat-pūjakānāṃ sāttvikāditvaṃ jñātavyam ity arthaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c17u:176: kenopāyena sā jñāyatām ity apekṣite deva-pūjādikārya-liṅgenānumeyety āha yajanta iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:177: janāḥ śāstrīya-viveka-hīnā ye svābhāvikyā śraddhayā devān vasu-rudrādīn sāttvikān yajante te 'nye sāttvikā jñeyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:178: ye ca yakṣān kuverādīn rakṣāṃsi ca rākṣasān nirṛti-prabhṛtīn rājasān yajante te 'nye rājasā jñeyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:179: ye ca pretān viprādayaḥ svadharmāt pracyutā deha-pātād ūrdhvaṃ vāyavīyaṃ deham āpannā
GE07bhg4c17u:180: ulkāmukha-kaṭa-pūtanādi-saṃjñāḥ pretā bhavantīti manūktān piśāca-viśeṣān vā bhūta-gaṇāṃś
GE07bhg4c17u:181: ca sapta-mātṛkādīṃś ca tāmasān yajante te 'nye tāmasā jñeyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:182: anya iti padaṃ triṣv api vailakṣaṇya-dyotanāya sambadhyate //4//
GE07bhg4c17u:184: uktam arthaṃ spaṣṭayati sāttvikāntaḥ-karaṇāḥ sāttvikyā śraddhayā sāttvika-śāstra-vidhinā sāttvikān devān eva yajante /
GE07bhg4c17u:186: evaṃ rājasā rājasāntaḥ-karaṇā ity ādi vivaritavyam //4//
GE07bhg4c17u:187: baladevaḥ : kārya-bhedena sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ prapañcayati yajanta iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:188: śāstrīya-viveka-saṃvid-vihīnā ye janāḥ svabhāva-jayā śraddhayā devān sāttvikān vasu-rudrādīn yajante te 'nye rājasāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:189: ye pretān bhūta-gaṇāṃś ca tāmasā yajante te 'nye tāmasāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:190: dvijāḥ svadharma-vibhraṣṭā deha-pātottara-labdha-vāyavīya-dehā ulkāmukha-kaṭa-pūtanādi-saṃjñāḥ pretā manūktāḥ piśāca-viśeṣā veti vyākhyātāraś cāt sapta-mātṛkādayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:191: evam ālasyāt tyakta-veda-vidhīnāṃ svabhāvān sāttvikādyā nirūpitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:192: ete ca balavad vaidika-sat-prasaṅgāt svabhāvān vijitya kadācid vede 'py adhikṛto bhavantīti bodhyam //4//
GE07bhg4c17u:194: aśāstra-vihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:198: śrīdharaḥ : rājasa-tāmaseṣv api punar viśeṣāntaram āha aśāstra-vihitam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:199: śāstra-vidhim ajānanto 'pi kecit prācīna-puṇya-saṃskāreṇa uttamāḥ sāttvikā eva bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:202: ye punar atyantaṃ manda-bhāgyās te gatānugatyā pāṣaṇḍa-saṅgena ca tad-ācārānuvartinaḥ santo 'śāstra-vihitaṃ ghoraṃ bhūta-bhayaṅkaraṃ tapas tapyante kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:210: śarīra-sthaṃ prārambhakatvena dehe sthitaṃ bhūtānāṃ pṛthivy-ādīnāṃ grāmaṃ samūhaṃ karśayanto vṛthaiva upavāsādibhiḥ kṛśaṃ kurvanto 'cetaso 'vivekinaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:211: māṃ cāntaryāmitayāntaḥ-śarīra-sthaṃ deha-madhye sthitaṃ mad-ājñā-laṅghanenaiva karśayantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:212: evaṃ ye tapaś caranti tān āsura-niścayān /
GE07bhg4c17u:216: tatra kecid rājasa-tāmasā api prāg-bhavīya-puṇya-paripākāt sāttvikā bhūtvā śāstrīya-sādhane 'dhikriyante /
GE07bhg4c17u:218: na muñcanti te śāstrīya-mārgād bhraṣṭā asan-mārgānusaraṇeneha loke paratra ca duḥkha-bhāgina
GE07bhg4c17u:220: aśāstra-vihitaṃ śāstreṇa vedena pratyakṣeṇānumitena vā na vihitam aśāstreṇa buddhādy-āgamena
GE07bhg4c17u:221: bodhitaṃ vā ghoraṃ parasyātmanaḥ pīḍā-karaṃ tapas tapta-śilā-rohaṇādi tapyante kurvanti ye janāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:222: dambho dhārmikatva-khyāpanam ahaṃkāro 'ham eva śreṣṭha iti durabhimānas tābhyāṃ samyag yuktāḥ,
GE07bhg4c17u:223: yogasya samyaktvam anāyāsena viyoga-jananā-sāmarthyaṃ kāme kāmyamāna-viṣaye yo rātgas tan-nimittaṃ balam atygra-duḥkha-sahana-sāmarthyaṃ tenānvitāḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:229: karśayantaḥ kṛśī-kurvanto vṛthopavāsādinā śarīra-sthaṃ bhūta-grāmaṃ dehendriya-saṃghātākāreṇa
GE07bhg4c17u:230: pariṇataṃ pṛthivyādi-bhūta-samudāyam acetaso viveka-śūnyā māṃ cāntaḥ-śarīra-sthaṃ bhoktṛ-rūpeṇa sthitaṃ bhogyasya śarīrasya kṛśīkaraṇena kṛśīkurvanta eva /
GE07bhg4c17u:231: māma antaryāmitvena śarīrāntaḥ-sthitaṃ buddhi-tad-vṛtti-sākṣi-bhūtam īśvaram ājñā-laṅghanena karśayanta iti vā /
GE07bhg4c17u:233: āsura-niścayān āsuro viparyāsa-rūpo vedārtha-virodhī niścayo yeṣāṃ tān manuṣyatvena
GE07bhg4c17u:234: pratīyamānān apy asura-kārya-kāritvād asurān viddhi jānīhi pariharaṇāya /
GE07bhg4c17u:236: asuratva-jāti-rahitānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ karmaṇaivāsuratvāt tān asurān viddhīti sākṣān noktam iti ca draṣṭavyam //5-6//
GE07bhg4c17u:238: yas tvayā pṛṣṭhaṃ ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya kāma-bhoga-rahitāḥ śraddhayā yajante teṣāṃ kā niṣṭhā iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:239: tasyottaram adhunā śṛṇv ity āha aśāstreti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:240: ghoraṃ prāṇi-bhayaṅkaraṃ tapas tapyante kurvantīty-upalakṣaṇam idaṃ japa-yāgādikam apy aśāstrīyaṃ kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:241: kāmācaraṇa-rāhityaṃ śraddhānvitatvaṃ ca svata eva labhyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:244: kāmaḥ svasyājarāmaratva-rājyādy-abhilāṣo rāgas tapasy āsaktir balaṃ hiraṇyakaśipu-prabhṛtīnām iva tapaḥ-karaṇa-sāmarthyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:246: bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ grāmaṃ samūhaṃ karśayantaḥ kṛśī-kurvanto māṃ ca mad-aṃśa-bhūtaṃ jīvaṃ ca duḥkhayantaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:247: / āsūya-niścayān asurāṇām eva niṣṭhāyāṃ sthitām ity arthaḥ //5-6//
GE07bhg4c17u:248: baladevaḥ : veda-bāhyānāṃ kadācid api durgater nistāro neti pūrvādhyāyoktaṃ dṛḍhayann āha aśāstreti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:249: aśāstreṇa veda-viruddhena svāgamena vihitaṃ ghoraṃ para-pīḍakaṃ tapo ye tapyante
GE07bhg4c17u:250: kurvanti kāma-rāgo viṣaya-spṛhā balaṃ ca mayā śakyam etat siddhaiḥ kartum iti durāgrahaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:251: śarīrastham ārambhakatayā śarīraṃ sthitaṃ bhūta-grāmaṃ pṛthivyādi-saṅghātaṃ karṣayanto
GE07bhg4c17u:253: cāvajñayā karṣayanto 'cetasaḥ śāstrīya-viveka-saṃvid-vihīnās tān veda-bāhyān āsura-niścayān
GE07bhg4c17u:254: niścayenāsurān viddhīti pūrvoktānāṃ teṣāṃ durgatir avarjanīyaiveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:255: svabhāvajayā śraddhayā yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-pretādīn yajatāṃ balavad-vaidika-sad-anugrahe sati
GE07bhg4c17u:257: devān yajatāṃ tu vastutaḥ sāttvikatvāt tad-anugrahe sati śāstrīyā sulabheti sthitam //5-6//
GE07bhg4c17u:259: āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:260: yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu //7//
GE07bhg4c17u:261: śrīdharaḥ : āhārādi-bhedād api sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ darśayitum āha āhāras tv ity ādi-trayodaśabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:262: sarvasyāpi janasya ya āhāro 'nnādi sa tu yathāyathaṃ trividhaḥ priyo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:263: tathā yajña-tapo-dānāni ca trividhāni bhavanti teṣāṃ vakṣyamānaṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c17u:264: etac ca rājasa-tāmasāhāra-yajñādi-parityāgena sāttvikāhāra-yajñādi-sevayā sattva-vṛddhau yatna-kartavya ity etad arthaṃ kathyate //7//
GE07bhg4c17u:266: ye sāttvikās te devā ye tu rājasās tāmasāś ca te viparyastatvād asurā iti sthite sāttvikānām ādānāya rājasa-tāmasānāṃ hānāya cāhāra-yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ traividhyam āha āhāra iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:268: āhāro 'pi sarvasya priyas trividha eva bhavati sarvasya triguṇātmakatvena caturthyāṃ vidhāyā asaṃbhavāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:269: yathā dṛṣṭārtha āhāras trividhas tathā yajña-tapo-dānānya-dṛṣṭārthāny api trividhāni /
GE07bhg4c17u:270: tatra yajñaṃ vyākhyāsyāmo dravya-devatā-tyāgaḥ iti kalpa-kārair devatoddeśena dravya-tyāgo yajña iti niruktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:271: sa ca yajatinā juhotinā ca coditatvena yāgo homaś ceti dvividha uttiṣṭhad-dhomā vaṣaṭ-kāra-prayogāntā
GE07bhg4c17u:276: teṣām āhāra-yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ sāttvika-rājasa-tāmasa-bhedaṃ mayā vyākhyāyamānam imaṃ śṛṇu //7//
GE07bhg4c17u:278: tad evaṃ ye śāstra-vidhi-tyāginaḥ kāma-cāreṇa vartante pūrvādhyāyoktā ye cāsminn adhyāye āsura-śāstra-vidhinā yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-pretādīn yajante,
GE07bhg4c17u:279: ye cāśāstrīyaṃ tapa-ādikaṃ kurvanti te sarve āsura-sarga-madhya-gatā eva bhavantīti prakaraṇārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:280: tathāpy āhārādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇānāṃ traividhyāt tadvatāṃ yathā-yogaṃ daivam āsuraṃ ca sargaṃ svayam eva vivicya jānīty āha āhāras tv ity ādi trayodaśabhiḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:281: baladevaḥ : evaṃ sthite tad-āhārādīnām api traividhyam āha āhāras tv iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:282: śraddhāvat sarvasya priyo 'nnādir āhāro 'pi trividho bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:287: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvika-priyāḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c17u:288: śrīdharaḥ : tatrāhāra-traividhyam āha āyur iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:304: āyuś cirañjīvanaṃ sattvaṃ citta-dhairyaṃ balavati duḥkhe 'pi nirvikāratvāpādakaṃ,
GE07bhg4c17u:320: rasyā iti kevala guḍādīnāṃ rasyatve 'pi rūkṣatvam ata āha snigdhā iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:321: dugdha-phenādīnāṃ rasyatva-snigdhatve 'pi asthairyam ata āha sthirā iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:322: panasa-phalādīnāṃ rasyatve snigdhatva-sthiratve 'pi hṛd-udarādy-ahitatvam ata āha hṛdyā hṛd-udara-hitā iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:323: tena sa-gavya-śarkarā-śāli-godhūmānnādaya eva rasyatvādi-catuṣṭaya-guṇavattvāt sāttvika-loka-priyā jñeyās teṣāṃ priyatve saty eva sāttvikatvaṃ ca jñeyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:324: kiṃ ca guṇa-catuṣṭayavattve 'pi apāvitrye sati sāttvika-priyatādarśanād atra pavitrā ity api viśeṣaṇaṃ deyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:326: baladevaḥ : tatra sāttvikāhāram āha āyuri iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:332: etāsāṃ vivardhanāḥ ramyatvādi-guṇavantaḥ sa-gavya-śarkarāḥ śāli-godhūmādayaḥ sāttvikānāṃ priyās tair upādeyā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:366: āmayaṃ rogaṃ ca dhātu-vaiṣamya-dvārā pradadatīti tathā-vidhā āhārā rājasasyeṣṭāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:367: etair liṅgaiḥ rājasā jñeyāḥ sāttvikaiś caita upekṣaṇīyā ity arthaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c17u:381: ati-kaṭur iti tikto nimbādir na ca maricādis tasya tīkṣṇa-śabdenokter atyamlo 'tilavaṇo 'tyuṣṇaś ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:382: khyāto 'titīkṣṇo marīcy-ādir atirukṣaḥ kaṅgukādir atidāhī rājikādiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:388: yāta-yāmaṃ gata-rasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat /
GE07bhg4c17u:391: yāto yāmaḥ praharo yasya pakvasyaudanādes tad yāta-yāmam /
GE07bhg4c17u:400: yātayāmam ardha-pakvaṃ nirvīryasya gata-rasa-padenoktatvād iti bhāṣyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:402: yāta-yāmaṃ pakvaṃ sat praharādi-vyavahita-modanādi śaityaṃ prāptam /
GE07bhg4c17u:410: etādṛśaṃ yad bhojanaṃ bhojyaṃ tat tāmasasya priyaṃ sāttvikair atidūrād upekṣaṇīyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:411: etādṛśa-bhojanasya duḥkha-śokāmaya-pradatvam atiprasiddham iti kaṇṭhato noktam /
GE07bhg4c17u:424: rājasa-varge dṛṣṭa-virodha-mātraṃ tāmasa-varge tu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-virodha ity atiśayaḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c17u:426: yāto yāmaḥ praharo yasya pakvasyaudanādes tad yāta-yāmaṃ śaityāvasthāṃ prāptam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:432: tataś caivaṃ paryālocya sva-hitaiṣibhiḥ sāttvika āhāraḥ sevya iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:433: vaiṣṇavais tu so 'pi bhagavad-aniveditas tyājya eva /
GE07bhg4c17u:434: bhagavan-niveditam annādikaṃ tu nirguṇa-bhakta-loka-priyam iti śrī-bhāgavatāj jñeyam //10//
GE07bhg4c17u:436: yāto 'tikrānto yāmaḥ praharo yasya rāddhasyānnādes tad yātayāmam /
GE07bhg4c17u:439: paryuṣitaṃ pūrve 'hni rāddham ucchiṣṭaṃ guror anyeṣāṃ bhuktāvaśiṣṭam amedhyam apavitraṃ kalañjādi /
GE07bhg4c17u:440: īdṛg-bhojanaṃ tāmasānāṃ priyaṃ sāttvikānāṃ tv atidūrato heyam //10//
GE07bhg4c17u:443: yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c17u:445: tatra sāttvikaṃ yajñam āha aphalākāṅkṣibhir iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:446: phalākāṅkṣā-rahitaiḥ puruṣair vidhinādiṣṭa āvaśyakatayā vihito yo yajña ijyate 'nuṣṭhīyate sa sāttviko yajñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:450: nānyat phalaṃ sādhanīyam ity evaṃ manaḥ samādhāyaikāgraṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c17u:452: idānīṃ krama-prāptaṃ trividhaṃ yajñam āha aphaleti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:455: phala-saṃyogaṃ vinā jīvanādi-nimitta-saṃyogena coditaḥ sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsambhave pratinidhy-ādy-upādānenāmukhya-kalpenāpy anuṣṭheyo nityaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:456: tatra sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsambhave 'pi pratinidhim upādāyāvaśyaṃ yaṣṭavyam eva pratyavāya-parihārāyāyāvaśyaka-jīvanādi-nimittena
GE07bhg4c17u:457: coditatvād iti manaḥ samādhāya niścityāphalākāṅkṣibhir antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhy-arthitayā
GE07bhg4c17u:458: kāmya-prayoga-vimukhair vidhi-dṛṣṭo yathā-śāstraṃ niścito yo yajña ijyate 'nuṣṭhīyate
GE07bhg4c17u:462: atha yajñasya traividhyam āha aphalākāṅkṣibhir iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:463: phalākāṅkṣā-rāhitye kathaṃ yajñe pravṛttir ata āha -- yaṣṭavyam eveti /
GE07bhg4c17u:464: svānuṣṭheyatvena śāstroktatvād avaśya-kartavyam etad iti manaḥ samādhāya //11//
GE07bhg4c17u:465: baladevaḥ : atha yajña-traividhyam āha aphaleti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:466: aphalākāṅkṣibhiḥ phalecchā-śūnyair yo yajña ijyate kriyate vidhi-dṛṣṭo vidhi-vākyāj jātaḥ sa sāttvikaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:467: nanu phalecchāṃ vinā tatra kathaṃ pravṛttis tatrāha yaṣṭavyam eveti /
GE07bhg4c17u:468: māṃ prati vedenoktatvāt tat yajanam eva kāryaṃ,
GE07bhg4c17u:469: na tu tena phalaṃ sādhyam iti manaḥ samādhāyaikāgraṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c17u:471: abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat /
GE07bhg4c17u:472: ijyate bharata-śreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam //12//
GE07bhg4c17u:474: phalam abhisandhāyoddiśya tu yad ijyate yajñaḥ kriyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:478: phalaṃ kāmyaṃ svargādi abhisandhāyoddiśya na tv antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:482: pāralaukikaṃ phalam abhisandhāyaivādambhārthatve 'pi pāralaukika-phalānabhisandhāne 'pi dambhārtham eveti vikalpena dvau pakṣau /
GE07bhg4c17u:483: pāralaukika-phalārtham apy aihalaukika-dambhārtham apīti samuccayenaikaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:484: evaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-phalābhisandhināntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhim anuddiśya yad ijyate yathā-śāstraṃ yo yajño 'nuṣṭhīyate taṃ yajñaṃ rājasaṃ viddhi hānāya
GE07bhg4c17u:487: baladevaḥ : phalaṃ svargādikam abhisandhāya yad ijyate dambhārhtaṃ vā svamahima-khyāpanāya,
GE07bhg4c17u:492: śrīdharaḥ : tāmasaṃ yajñam āha vidhi-hīnam iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:493: vidhi-hīnaṃ śāstrokta-vidhi-śūnyam asṛṣṭānnaṃ brāhmaṇādibhyo na sṛṣṭaṃ na niṣpāditam annaṃ yasmiṃs tam /
GE07bhg4c17u:495: yathokta-dakṣiṇā-rahitaṃ śraddhā-śūnyaṃ ca yajñaṃ tāmasaṃ paricakṣate kathayanti śiṣṭāḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c17u:497: yathā-śāstra-bodhita-viparītam anna-dāna-hīnaṃ svarato varṇataś ca mantra-hīnaṃ yathokta-dakṣiṇā-hīnam ṛtvig-dveṣādinā śraddhā-rahitaṃ tāmasaṃ yajñaṃ paricakṣate śiṣṭāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:498: vidhi-hīnatvādy-ekaika-viśeṣaṇaḥ pañca-vidhaḥ sarva-viśeṣaṇa-samuccayena caika-vidha iti ṣaṭ /
GE07bhg4c17u:499: dvi-tri-catur-viśeṣaṇa-samuccayena ca bahavo bhedās tāmasa-yajñasya jñeyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:500: rājase yajñe 'ntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhy-abhāve 'pi phalotpādakam apūrvam asti yathā-śāstram anuṣṭhānāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:501: tāmase tv ayathā-śāstrānuṣṭhānān na kim apy apūrvam astīty atiśayaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c17u:504: baladevaḥ : vidhīti asṛṣṭānnam anna-dāna-rahitaṃ mantra-hīnaṃ svarato varṇataś ca hīnena mantraṇopetaṃ śraddhā-virahitaṃ ṛtvig-vidveṣāt //13//
GE07bhg4c17u:506: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate //14//
GE07bhg4c17u:507: śrīdharaḥ : tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ darśayituṃ prathamaṃ tāvat śārīrādi-bhedena tasya traividhyam āha devety ādi tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:510: deva-brāhmaṇādi-pūjanaṃ śaucādikaṃ ca śārīraṃ śarīra-nirvartyaṃ tapa ucyate //14//
GE07bhg4c17u:512: krama-prāptasya tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ kathayituṃ śārīra-vācika-mānasa-bhedena tasya travidhyam āha tribhiḥ deveti /
GE07bhg4c17u:519: ārjavam akauṭilyaṃ bhāva-saṃśuddhi-śabdena mānase tapasi vakṣyati /
GE07bhg4c17u:524: śārīraṃ śarīra-pradhānaiḥ kartrādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ na tu kevalena śarīreṇa
GE07bhg4c17u:525: / pañcaite tasya hetava iti hi vakṣyati /
GE07bhg4c17u:528: tapasas traividhyaṃ vadana prathamaṃ sāttvikasya tapasas traividhyam āha devety ādi tribhiḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c17u:529: baladevaḥ : krama-prāptasya tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ vaktuṃ tasyādau śārīrādi-bhāvena traividhyam āha deveti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:530: devā vasu-rudrādayo dvijā brāhmaṇa-śreṣṭhā guravo mātṛ-pitṛ-deśikāḥ prājñā vidita-veda-vedāṅgāḥ pare 'tra teṣāṃ pūjanam /
GE07bhg4c17u:536: anudvega-karaṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priya-hitaṃ ca yat /
GE07bhg4c17u:538: śrīdharaḥ : vācikaṃ tapa āha anudvegakaram iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:539: udvegaṃ bhayaṃ na karotīty anudvegakaraṃ vākyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:542: svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ vedābhyāsaś ca vāṅ-mayaṃ vācā nirvartyaṃ tapaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c17u:546: priyaṃ śrotus tat-kāla-śruti-sukhaṃ hitaṃ pariṇāme sukha-karam /
GE07bhg4c17u:548: anudvega-karatvādi-viśeṣaṇa-catuṣṭayena viśiṣṭaṃ na tv ekenāpi viśeṣaṇena nyūnam /
GE07bhg4c17u:549: yad vākyaṃ yathā śānto bhava vatsa svādhyāyaṃ yogaṃ cānutiṣṭha tathā te śreyo bhaviṣyatīty ādi tad vāṅ-mayaṃ vācikaṃ tapaḥ śārīravat /
GE07bhg4c17u:550: svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ ca yathā-vidhi vedābhyāsaś ca vāṅ-mayaṃ tapa ucyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:554: baladevaḥ : anudvegakaram udvegaṃ bhayaṃ kasyāpi yan na karoti /
GE07bhg4c17u:558: etad-viśeṣaṇa-catuṣṭayavad-vākyaṃ tathā svādhyāyasya vedābhyasanaṃ ca vāṅ-mayaṃ vācā nirvartyaṃ tapaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c17u:561: bhāva-saṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate //16//
GE07bhg4c17u:562: śrīdharaḥ : mānasaṃ tapa āha manaḥ-prasāda iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:573: maunaṃ muni-bhāva ekāgratayātma-cintanaṃ nididhyāsanākhyaṃ vāk-saṃyama-hetur manaḥ-saṃyamo maunam iti bhāṣyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:574: ātma-vinigraha ātmano manaso viśeṣeṇa sarva-vṛtti-nigraho nirodha-samādhir asamprajñātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:576: punar aśuddhy-utpāda-rāhityena samyaktvena viśiṣṭā sā bhāva-śuddhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:577: paraiḥ saha vyavahāra-kāle māyā-rāhityaṃ seti bhāṣyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:578: ity etad evaṃ-prakāraṃ tapo mānasam ucyate //16//
GE07bhg4c17u:587: śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:589: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ śarīra-vāṅ-manobhir nirvartyaṃ trividhaṃ tapo darśitam /
GE07bhg4c17u:590: tasya trividhasyāpi tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedena traividhyam āha śraddhayetyādi-tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:591: tat trividham api tapaḥ parayā śreṣṭhayā śraddhayā phalākāṅkṣā-śūnyair yuktair ekāgra-cittair narais taptaṃ sāttvikaṃ kathayanti //17//
GE07bhg4c17u:593: śārīra-vācika-mānasa-bhedena trividhasyoktasya tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedena traividhyam idānīṃ darśayati śraddhayeti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:594: tat-pūrvoktaṃ trividhaṃ śārīraṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca tapaḥ śraddhayāstikya-buddhyā
GE07bhg4c17u:596: siddhy-asiddhyor nirvikārair narair adhikāribhis taptam anuṣṭhitaṃ sāttvikaṃ paricakṣate śiṣṭāḥ //17 //
GE07bhg4c17u:599: baladevaḥ : uktasya tapasaḥ sāttvikāditayā traividhyam āha śraddhayeti-tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:600: tad uktaṃ trividhaṃ tapaḥ phalākāṅkṣā-śūnyair yuktair ekāgra-cittair narair parayā śraddhayā taptam anuṣṭhitaṃ sāttvikam //17//
GE07bhg4c17u:603: kriyate tad iha proktaṃ rājasaṃ calam adhruvam //18//
GE07bhg4c17u:605: sat-kāraḥ sādhur ayam iti tāpaso 'yam ity ādi vāk-pūjā /
GE07bhg4c17u:608: etad-arthaṃ dambhena ca yat tapaḥ kriyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:611: yad evambhūtaṃ tapas tad iha rājasaṃ proktam //18//
GE07bhg4c17u:613: satkāraḥ sādhur ayaṃ tapasvī brāhmaṇa ity evam avivekibhiḥ kriyamāṇā stutiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:616: tad-arthaṃ dambhenaiva ca kevalaṃ dharma-dhvajitvenaiva ca na tv āstikya-buddhyā yat tapaḥ kriyate tad rājasaṃ proktaṃ śiṣṭaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:617: ihāsminn eva loke phaladaṃ na pāralaukikaṃ calam atyalpa-kāla-sthāyi-phalam /
GE07bhg4c17u:620: sat-kāraḥ sādhur ayam ity anyaḥ kartavyā vāk-pūjā /
GE07bhg4c17u:621: mānaḥ pratutthānābhivādanādibhir anyaiḥ kartavyā daihikī pūjā /
GE07bhg4c17u:622: pūjā anyair dīyamānair dhanādibhir bhāvinī vā mānasī pūjā tad artham /
GE07bhg4c17u:623: dambhena ca yat kriyate tad rājasaṃ tapaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:626: baladevaḥ : sat-kāraḥ sādhur ayaṃ tapasvīti stutiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:628: pūjā caraṇa-prakṣālana-dhan-dānadis tad-arthaṃ yat tapo dambhena ca kriyate tad rājasaṃ proktam /
GE07bhg4c17u:635: mūḍha-grāheṇāviveka-kṛtena durāgraheṇātmanā pīḍayā yat tapaḥ kriyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:636: parasyotsādanārthaṃ vā anyasya vināśārtham abhicāra-rūpaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtaṃ kathitam //19//
GE07bhg4c17u:639: tapaḥ kriyate parasyotsādanārthaṃ vānyasya vināśārtham abhicāra-rūpaṃ vā tat tāmasam
GE07bhg4c17u:644: baladevaḥ : mūḍha-grāheṇāvivekajena durāgraheṇātmanā dehendriyādeḥ pīḍayā ca yat tapaḥ parasyotsādanārthaṃ vināśāya vā kriyate tat tāmasam //19//
GE07bhg4c17u:647: deśe kāle ca pātre ca tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam //20//
GE07bhg4c17u:648: śrīdharaḥ : pūrvaṃ pratijñātam eva dānasya traividhyam āha dātavyam iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:649: dātavyam evety evaṃ niścayena yad dānaṃ dīyate 'nupakāriṇe pratyupakāra-samarthāya /
GE07bhg4c17u:656: sa hi sarvasmād āpad-gaṇād dātāraṃ pātīti pātā /
GE07bhg4c17u:657: tasmai yad evambhūtaṃ dānaṃ tat sāttvikam //20//
GE07bhg4c17u:659: idānīṃ krama-prāptasya dānasya traividhyaṃ darśayati dātavyam iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:660: dātavyam eva śāstra-condanā-vaśād ity evaṃ niścayena na tu phalābhisandhinā yad dānaṃ tulā-puruṣādi dīyate 'nupakāriṇe pratyupakārājanakāya
GE07bhg4c17u:661: deśe puṇye kurukṣetrādau kāle ca puṇye sūryoparāgādau /
GE07bhg4c17u:665: vidyā-tapobhyām ātmano dātuś ca pālana-kṣama eva pratigṛhṇīyād iti śāstrāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:670: baladevaḥ : atha dānasya traividhyam āha dātavyam iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:671: niścayena yad dānam anupakāriṇe pātre vidyā-tapobhyāṃ dātū rakṣakāya brāhmaṇāya yad dīyate tad dānaṃ sāttvikam /
GE07bhg4c17u:675: yat tu pratyupakārārthaṃ phalam uddiśya vā punaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:676: dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam //21//
GE07bhg4c17u:677: śrīdharaḥ : rājasaṃ dānam āha yad iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:678: kālāntare 'yaṃ māṃ pratyupakariṣyatīty evam arthaṃ phalaṃ vā svargādikam uddiśya
GE07bhg4c17u:679: yat punar dānaṃ dīyate parikliṣṭaṃ citta-kleśa-yuktaṃ yathā bhavati evambhūtaṃ tad
GE07bhg4c17u:682: pratyupakārārthaṃ kālāntare mām ayaṃ upakariṣyatīty evam dṛṣṭārthaṃ phalaṃ vā svargādikam
GE07bhg4c17u:683: uddiśya yat punar dānaṃ sāttvika-vilakṣaṇaṃ dīyate parikliṣṭaṃ ca katham etāvad vyayitam
GE07bhg4c17u:684: iti paścāt tāpa-yuktaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ ca yad dīyate tad dānaṃ rājasam udāhṛtam //21 //
GE07bhg4c17u:686: para-kliṣṭaṃ katham etāvad vyayitam iti paścāt-tāpa-yuktam /
GE07bhg4c17u:687: yad vā ditsāyāṃ abhāve 'pi gurv-ādyājñānrodha-vaśād eva dattam /
GE07bhg4c17u:689: baladevaḥ : yat tu pratupakārārthaṃ dṛṣṭa-phalārthaṃ phalaṃ vā svargādikam adṛṣṭam uddiśyānusandhāya dīyate tad dānaṃ rājasam /
GE07bhg4c17u:690: parikliṣṭaṃ katham etāvad vyayitavyam iti paścāt-tāpa-yuktaṃ yathā syāt tathā guru-vākyānurodhād vā yad dīyate tad rājasam //21//
GE07bhg4c17u:692: adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaś ca dīyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:698: yad dānaṃ dīyate deśa-kāla-pātra-sampattāv apy asat-kṛtaṃ pāda-prakṣālanādi-satkāra-śūnyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:702: adeśe svato durjana-saṃsargād vā pāpa-hetāv aśuci-sthāne /
GE07bhg4c17u:705: apātrebhyaś ca vidyā-tapo-rahitebhyo naṭa-viṭādibhyo yad dānaṃ dīyate deśa-kāla-pātra-sampattāv
GE07bhg4c17u:713: deśādi-sampattāv api yad asatkṛtaṃ caraṇa-prakṣālanādi-satkāra-śūnyam avajñātaṃ tūṅkārādy-anādara-bhāṣaṇopetaṃ ca yad dānaṃ tat tāmasam //22//
GE07bhg4c17u:715: oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:716: brāhmaṇās tena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ purā //23//
GE07bhg4c17u:719: śrīdharaḥ : nanv evaṃ vicāryamāṇe sarvam api yajña-tapo-dānādi rājasa-tāmasa-prāyam
GE07bhg4c17u:720: eveti vyartho yajñādi-prayāsa ity āśaṅkya tathāvidhasyāpi sāttvikatvopapādanāt prakāraṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:722: oṃ tat sad iti trividho brahmaṇaḥ paramātmano nirdeśo nāma-vyapadeśaḥ smṛtaḥ śiṣṭaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:723: tatra tāvad om iti brahma ity ādi śruti-prasiddher om iti brahmaṇo nāma /
GE07bhg4c17u:724: jagat-kāraṇatvenāti-prasiddhatvād aviduṣāṃ parokṣatvāc ca tac-chabdo 'pi brahmaṇo nāma /
GE07bhg4c17u:726: sad eva saumyedam agra āsīt ity ādi śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:727: ayaṃ trividho 'pi nāma nirdeśena brāhmaṇāś ca vedāś ca yajñāś purā sṛṣṭy-ādau vihitā vidhātrā nirmitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:729: yathā yasyāyaṃ trividho nirdeśas tena paramātmanā brāhmaṇādayaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:731: tasmāt tasyāyaṃ trividho nirdeśo 'tipraśasta ity arthaḥ //23//
GE07bhg4c17u:732: idānīṃ pratyekam oṅkārādīnāṃ prāśastyaṃ darśayiṣyann oṅkārasya tad evāha tasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:733: yasmād evaṃ brahmaṇo nirdeśaḥ praśastas tasmād om ity udāhṛtya uccārya kṛtā veda-vādināṃ yajñādyāḥ śāstroktāḥ kriyāḥ satataṃ sarvadā aṅga-vaikalye 'pi prakarṣeṇa vartante /
GE07bhg4c17u:736: tad evam āhāra-yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ traividhya-kathanena sāttvikāni tāny ādeyāni rājasa-tāmasāni tu parihartavyānīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c17u:738: yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ tv adṛṣṭārthānām aṅga-vaiguṇyād apūrvānutpattau phalābhāvaḥ syād
GE07bhg4c17u:739: iti sāttvikānī̀am api teṣām ānarthakyaṃ prāptaṃ pramāda-bahulatvād anuṣṭhātṝṇām atas
GE07bhg4c17u:740: tad-vaiguṇya-parihārārya oṃ tat sad iti bhagavan-nāmoccāraṇa-rūpaṃ sāmānya-prāyaścittaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:742: oṃ tat sad ity evaṃ-rūpo brahmaṇaḥ paramātmano nirdeśo nirdiśyate 'neneti nirdeśaḥ pratipādaka-śabdo nāmeti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c17u:743: trividhas tisro vidhā avayavā yasya sa trividhaḥ smṛto vedānta-vidbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:746: yasmāt pūrvair maharṣibhir ayaṃ brahmaṇo nirdeśaḥ smṛtas tasmād idānīntanair api smartavya iti vidhir atra kalpyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:747: vaṣaṭ-kartuḥ prathama-bhakṣa ity ādiṣv iva vacanāni tv apūrvatvād iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:748: yajña-dāna-tapaḥ-kriyā-saṃyogāc cāsya tad avaiguṇyam eva phalaṃ ṣṭāśva-dagdha-ratha-vat-parasparākāṅkṣayā kalpyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:750: smaraṇād eva tad viṣṇoḥ sampūrṇaṃ syād iti śrutiḥ //
GE07bhg4c17u:754: brāhmaṇādyāḥ kartāro vedāḥ karaṇāni yajñāḥ karmāṇi tena brahmaṇo nirdeśena karaṇa-bhūtena purā vihitāḥ prajāpatinā /
GE07bhg4c17u:755: tasmād yajñādi-sṛṣṭi-hetutvena tad-vaiguṇya-parihāra-samartho mahā-prabhāvo 'yaṃ nirdeśa ity arthaḥ //23//
GE07bhg4c17u:757: tat-samudāya-rūpaṃ brahmaṇo nirdeśaṃ stuty-atiśayāya vyākhyātum ārabhate caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:758: tatra prathamam oṃkāraṃ vyācaṣṭe tasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:759: yasmād om iti brahma ity ādiṣu śrutiṣv om iti brahmaṇo nāma prasiddhaṃ tasmād om
GE07bhg4c17u:760: ity udāhṛtyoṃkāroccāraṇānantaraṃ vidhānoktā vidhi-śāstra-bodhitā brahma-vādināṃ veda-vādināṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:761: yajña-dāna-tapaḥ-kriyāḥ satataṃ pravartante prakṛṣṭatayā vaiguṇya-rāhityena vartante /
GE07bhg4c17u:762: yasyaikāvayavoccāraṇād apy avaiguṇyaṃ kiṃ punas tasya sarvasyoccāraṇād iti stuty-atiśayaḥ //24//
GE07bhg4c17u:764: tad evaṃ tapo-yajñādīnāṃ traividhyaṃ sāmānyato manuṣya-mātram adhikṛtyoktam /
GE07bhg4c17u:765: tatra ye sāttvikeṣv api madhye brahma-vādinas teṣāṃ tu brahma-nirdeśa-pūrvakā eva yajñādayo bhavantīty āha oṃ tat sad ity evaṃ brahmaṇo nirdeśo nāmnā vyapadeśaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:767: tatra om iti sarva-śrutiṣu prasiddham eva brahmaṇo nāma /
GE07bhg4c17u:768: jagat-kāraṇatvenātiprasiddher atan-nirasanena ca prasiddhes tad iti ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:769: sad eva saumyedam agra āsīt iti śruteḥ sad iti ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:770: yasmāt oṃ tat sat śabda-vācyena brahmaṇaiva brāhmaṇā vedā yajñāś ca vihitāḥ kṛtās
GE07bhg4c17u:771: tasmāt om iti brahmaṇo nāmodāhṛtyoccārya vartamānānāṃ brahma-vādināṃ yajñādayaḥ pravartante //23-24 //
GE07bhg4c17u:772: baladevaḥ : tad evaṃ tapo-yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ traividhya-kathanena sāttvikānāṃ teṣām upadeyatvaṃ,
GE07bhg4c17u:774: atha sāttvikādhikāriṇāṃ yajñādīni viṣṇu-nāma-pūrvakāṇy evabhavantīty ucyate om iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:775: om ity ādikas trividho brahmaṇo viṣṇor nirdeśo nāma-dheyaṃ śiṣṭaiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:776: om ity etad brahmaṇo nediṣṭaṃ nāma iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:778: tat tvam asi iti śruteḥ tad iti dvitīyaṃ nāma /
GE07bhg4c17u:779: sad eva saumya iti śruteḥ sad iti tṛtīyaṃ nāma /
GE07bhg4c17u:781: viṣṇv-ādi-nāmnāṃ tena trividhena nirdeśena brāhmaṇā vedā yajñāś ca purā caturmukhena
GE07bhg4c17u:782: vihitāḥ prakaṭitās tasmān mahā-prabhāvo 'yaṃ nirdeśas tat-pūrvakāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ nāṅga-vaiguṇyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:784: yasmād evaṃ tasmād om iti nirdeśam udāhṛtyoccāryānuṣṭhitā brahma-vādināṃ sāttvikānāṃ trai-varṇikānāṃ yajñādyāḥ kriyāḥ pravartante /
GE07bhg4c17u:789: śrīdharaḥ : dvitīyaṃ nāma prastautīti tad iti tad ity udāhṛtya iti pūrvasyānuṣaṅgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:790: tad ity udāhṛtyoccārya śuddha-cittair mokṣa-kāṅkṣibhiḥ puruṣaiḥ phalābhisandhim akṛtvā yajñādyāḥ kriyāḥ kriyante /
GE07bhg4c17u:791: ataś citta-śodhana-dvāreṇa phala-saṅkalpa-tyajanena mumukṣutva-sampādakatvāt tac-chabda-nirdeśaḥ praśasta ity arthaḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c17u:794: tattvam asi ity ādi-śruti-prasiddhaṃ tad iti brahmaṇo nāmodāhṛtya phalam anabhisandhāyāntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhy-arthaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:795: yajña-tapaḥ-kriyā dāna-kriyāś ca vividhā mokṣa-kāṅkṣibhiḥ kriyante tasmād atipraśastam etat //25 //
GE07bhg4c17u:799: baladevaḥ : tad iti nirdeśam udāhṛtya phalam anabhisandhāya yajñādī-kriyā mokṣa-kāṅkṣibhis taiḥ kriyante anuṣṭhīyante /
GE07bhg4c17u:802: sad-bhāve sādhu-bhāve ca sad ity etat prayujyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:803: praśaste karmaṇi tathā sac-chabdaḥ pārtha yujyate //26//
GE07bhg4c17u:804: yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sad iti cocyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:805: karma caiva tad-arthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate //27//
GE07bhg4c17u:806: śrīdharaḥ : sac-chabdasya prāśastyam āha sad-bhāva iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:810: deva-dattasya putrādi śreṣī̀oham ity asminn arthe /
GE07bhg4c17u:812: praśaste māṅgalike vivāhādi-karmaṇi ca sad idaṃ karmeti sac-chabdo yujyate prayujyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:815: yajñādiṣu ca yā sthitis tātparyenāvasthānaṃ tad api sad ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:816: yasya cedaṃ nāma-trayaṃ sa eva paramātmā arthaḥ phalaṃ yasya tat-tad-arthaṃ karma-pūjopahāra-gṛhāṅgana-parimārjanopalepana-raṅga-māṅgalikādi-kriyā
GE07bhg4c17u:817: tat-siddhaye yad anyat karma kriyata udyāna-śāli-kṣetra-dhanārjanādi-viṣayaṃ tat
GE07bhg4c17u:819: tac cātivyavahitam api sad ity evābhidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:820: yasmād evam ati-praśastam etan nāma-trayaṃ tasmād etat sarva-karma-sādguṇyārthaṃ kīrayed iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:823: apare tu pravartante vidhinoktāḥ kriyante mokṣa-kāṅkṣibhiḥ ity ādi vartamānopadeśaḥ samidhā yajatīty ādivad vidhitayā pariṇamanīya ity āhuḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:824: tat tu sad-bhāve sādhu-bhāve cety ādiṣu prāptārthatvān na saṅgacchata iti
GE07bhg4c17u:827: tṛtīyaṃ sac-cabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe sad-bhāva iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:828: sad eva somyedam agra āsīt ity ādi-śruti-prasiddhaṃ sad ity etad brahmaṇo nāma sad-bhāve
GE07bhg4c17u:829: 'vidyamānatva-śaṅkāyāṃ vidyamānatve sādhu-bhāve cāsādhutva-śaṅkāyāṃ sādhutve caprayujyate śiṣṭaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:830: tasmād vaiguṇya-parihāreṇa yajñādeḥ sādhutvaṃ tat-phalasya ca vidyamānatvaṃ kartuṃ kṣamam etad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:831: tathā sad-bhāva-sādhu-bhāvayor iva praśaste 'pratibandhenāśu-sukha-janake māṅgalike karmaṇi vivāhādau sac-chabdo he pārtha yujyate prayujyate
GE07bhg4c17u:832: tasmād apratibandhenāśu-phala-janakatvaṃ vaiguṇya-parihāreṇa yajñādeḥ samartham etan nāmeti praśastataram etad ity arthaḥ //26//
GE07bhg4c17u:833: yajñe tapasi dāne ca yā sthitis tat-paratayāvasthitir niṣṭhā sāpi sad ity ucyate vidvadbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:834: karma caiva tad-arthīyaṃ teṣu yajña-dāna-tapo-rūpeṣv artheṣu bhavaṃ tad-anukūlam
GE07bhg4c17u:835: eva ca karma tad-arthīyaṃ bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kriyamāṇaṃ karma vā tad-arthīyaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:837: tasmāt sad iti nāma karma-vaiguṇyāpanodana-samarthaṃ praśastataram /
GE07bhg4c17u:838: yasyaikaiko 'vayavo 'py etādṛśaḥ kiṃ vaktavyaṃ tat-samudāyasya oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśasya māhātmyam iti saṃpiṇḍitārthaḥ //27//
GE07bhg4c17u:841: tasmāt praśasta-mātre karmaṇi prākṛte 'prākṛte 'pi sac-chabdaḥ prayoktavya ity āśayenāha sad-bhāva iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:842: sad-bhāve brahmatve sādhu-bhāve brahma-vāditve prayujyate saṅgacchata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:844: tad-arthīyaṃ karma brahmacaryopayogi yat karma bhagavan-mandira-mārjanādikam tad api //26-27//
GE07bhg4c17u:845: baladevaḥ : sad iti nirdeśaḥ praśasteṣv arthāntareṣu vartate tasmāt praśaste karma-mātre sa prayojya iti bhāvenāha sad-bhāva iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:846: sad-bhāve brahma-bhāve sādhu-bhāve ca brahma-jñatve 'bhidhāyakatayā sac-chabdaḥ prayujyate sad eva saumya ity ādau /
GE07bhg4c17u:848: tathā praśaste upanayana-vivāhādike ca māṅgalike karmaṇi sac-chabdo yujyate saṅgacchate /
GE07bhg4c17u:849: yajñādau yā teṣāṃ sthitis tātparyeṇāvasthitis tad api sad ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:850: yasyedaṃ nāma-trayaṃ tad-arthīyaṃ karma ca tan-mandira-nirmāṇa-tad-vimārjanādi sad ity abhidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:851: atra trividho 'yaṃ nirdeśaḥ smartavya iti vidhiḥ kalpyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:852: vaṣaṭ-kartuḥ prathamaṃ bhakṣyaḥ ity ādāv iva vacanāni tv apūrvatvād iti nyāyād yajña-dānādi-saṃyogāc cāsya tad-vaiguṇyam eva phalam /
GE07bhg4c17u:854: smaraṇād eva tad viṣṇoḥ sampūrṇaṃ syād iti śrutiḥ //
GE07bhg4c17u:857: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
GE07bhg4c17u:858: asad ity ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha //28//
GE07bhg4c17u:859: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ sarva-karmasu śraddhayaiva praṛtty-artham aśraddhayā kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ nindati aśraddhayeti /
GE07bhg4c17u:864: tat sarvam asad ity ucyate yatas tat pretya lokāntare na phalati viguṇatvāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:865: no iha na ca asmin loke phalati ayaśaskatvāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:871: yady ālasyādinā śāstrīyaṃ vidhim utsṛjya śraddadhānatayaiva vṛddha-vyavahāra-mātreṇa
GE07bhg4c17u:872: yajña-tapo-dānādi kurvatāṃ pramādād vaiguṇyaṃ prāpta oṃ tat sad iti brahma-nirdeśena
GE07bhg4c17u:873: tat-parihāras tarhy aśraddadhānatayā śāstrīyaṃ vidhim utsṛjya kāma-kāreṇa yat kiṃcid
GE07bhg4c17u:874: yajñādi kurvatām asurāṇām api tenaiva vaiguṇya-parihāraḥ syād iti kṛtaṃ śraddhayā
GE07bhg4c17u:876: aśraddhayā yad dhutaṃ havanaṃ kṛtam agnau dattaṃ yad brāhmaṇebhyo yat tapas taptaṃ yac cānyat karma kṛtaṃ stuti-namaskārādi tat sarvam aśraddhayā kṛtam asad asādhv ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:877: ata eva oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśena na tasya sādhu-bhāvaḥ śakyate kartuṃ sarvathā tad-ayogyatvāc chilāyā ivāṅkuraḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:878: tat kasmād asad ity ucyate śṛṇu he pārtha /
GE07bhg4c17u:880: yasmāt tad-aśraddhākṛtaṃ na pretya para-loke phalati viguṇatvenāpūrvājanakatvāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:881: no iha nāpīha loke yaśaḥ sādhubhir ninditatvāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:882: ata aihikāmuṣmika-phala-vikalatvād aśraddhā-kṛtasya sāttvikyā śraddhayaiva sāttvikaṃ yajñādi kuryād antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhaye /
GE07bhg4c17u:883: tādṛśasyaiva śraddhā-pūrvakasya sāttvikasya yajñāder daivād vaiguṇya-śaṅkāyāṃ brahmaṇo nāma-nirdeśena sādguṇyaṃ sampādanīyam iti paramārthaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:884: śraddhā-pūrvakam asāttvikam api yajñādi viguṇaṃ brahmaṇo nāma-nirdeśena sāttvikaṃ sa-guṇaṃ ca sampāditaṃ bhavatīti bhāṣyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:885: tad evam asminn adhyāya ālasyādinānādṛta-śāstrāṇāṃ śraddhā-pūrvakaṃ vṛddha-vyavahāra-mātreṇa
GE07bhg4c17u:887: kim asurā amī devā vety arjuna-saṃśaya-viṣayāṇāṃ rājasa-tāmasa-śraddhā-pūrvakaṃ rājasa-tāmasa-yajñādi-kāriṇo
GE07bhg4c17u:895: tathāsat karma kim ity apekṣāyām āha aśraddayeti /
GE07bhg4c17u:899: yad anyac cāpi karma kṛtaṃ tat sarvam asad iti hutam apy ahutam eva /
GE07bhg4c17u:901: tapo 'py ataptam eva kṛtam apy akṛtam eva /
GE07bhg4c17u:902: yatas tat na pretya na para-loke phalati nāpīha-loke phalati //28//
GE07bhg4c17u:903: ukteṣu vividheṣv eva sāttvikaṃ śraddhayā kṛtam /
GE07bhg4c17u:904: yat syāt tad eva mokṣārham ity adhyāyārtha īritaḥ //
GE07bhg4c17u:906: gītāsv ayaṃ saptadaśaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām // //17//
GE07bhg4c17u:907: baladevaḥ : atha sāttvikyā śraddhayā sarveṣu karmasu pravartitavyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:908: tayā vinā sarvaṃ vyartham iti nindati aśraddhayeti /
GE07bhg4c17u:911: taptam anuṣṭhitaṃ yac cānyad api stuti-praṇaty-ādi-karma kṛtaṃ,
GE07bhg4c17u:912: tat sarvam asan nindyam ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:915: tat pretya para-loke na phalati viguṇāt tasmāt pūrvānutpatter nāpīha loke kīrtiḥ sadbhir ninditatvāt //28//
GE07bhg4c17u:916: śraddhāṃ svabhāvajāṃ hitvā śāstrajāṃ tāṃ samāśritaḥ /
